radiographic_examinations.findings: large mediastinal mass and left pleural effusion

anterior mediastinal soft-tissue mass measuring 10.0 cm craniocaudally, 10.1 cm transversely, and 5.0 cm anteroposteriorly, left pleural soft-tissue nodules, pleural effusion, and associated atelectasis
new nodular left pleural thickening, suggestive of metastatic disease
pleural and pulmonary nodules stable, consistent with known thoracic metastases
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: pleural and pulmonary nodules had not changed

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT of the abdomen and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: mild circumferential wall thickening of the sigmoid colon and prominence of the vasa recta, suggestive of inflammation
